name: luna_battlebegins_02
text: Watch over me, Goddess. It'll be a good show.
text_simple: watch over me goddess itll be a good show

name: luna_firstblood_01
text: First blood! For Selemene and for the Dark Moon!
text_simple: first blood for selemene and for the dark moon

name: luna_ability_eclipse_08
text: Let the sky tear down the unworthy!
text_simple: let the sky tear down the unworthy

name: luna_levelup_08
text: They will find my blade sharp, and cruel.
text_simple: they will find my blade sharp and cruel

name: luna_levelup_10
text: The moon waxes, and my mercy wanes.
text_simple: the moon waxes and my mercy wanes

name: luna_kill_05
text: Aww. Are you not going to beg?
text_simple: aww are you not going to beg

name: luna_kill_06
text: Lost in the woods, are you?
text_simple: lost in the woods are you

name: luna_kill_07
text: Do not cross the Dark Moon.
text_simple: do not cross the dark moon

name: luna_kill_10
text: What is this? I came here for a battle!
text_simple: what is this i came here for a battle

name: luna_rival_01
text: Did you hear that, Nova? He thought he was a lion!
text_simple: did you hear that nova he thought he was a lion

name: luna_rival_02
text: And they call me cold hearted...
text_simple: and they call me cold hearted

name: luna_rival_05
text: The moon does play favorites, Night Stalker.
text_simple: the moon does play favorites night stalker

name: luna_rival_06
text: The moon turns against the Night Stalker.
text_simple: the moon turns against the night stalker

name: luna_rival_08
text: Normally I look my enemies in the eyes when I slay them.
text_simple: normally i look my enemies in the eyes when i slay them

name: luna_rival_09
text: Looks like time has finally caught up to you.
text_simple: looks like time has finally caught up to you

name: luna_rival_10
text: Not bad for a cat toy.
text_simple: not bad for a cat toy

name: luna_rival_11
text: Two heads, and not one wit.
text_simple: two heads and not one wit

name: luna_rival_12
text: All your brilliance comes to nothing.
text_simple: all your brilliance comes to nothing

name: luna_rival_14
text: I'll take your hoof for a trophy.
text_simple: ill take your hoof for a trophy

name: luna_rival_16
text: I've waited years to do that.
text_simple: ive waited years to do that

name: luna_rival_17
text: Don't blame me for being ambitious.
text_simple: dont blame me for being ambitious

name: luna_rival_19
text: Nova loves to play with vermin.
text_simple: nova loves to play with vermin

name: luna_ally_01
text: You will have your vengeance, Spirit.
text_simple: you will have your vengeance spirit

text: Ah, Zeus! The heavens are with us.

name: luna_respawn_05
text: The woods are unsafe. My work is not yet complete!
text_simple: the woods are unsafe my work is not yet complete

name: luna_respawn_06
text: Oh they will rue this day.
text_simple: oh they will rue this day

name: luna_rare_01
text: I would water the trees with their entrails if Selemene would smile on me.
text_simple: i would water the trees with their entrails if selemene would smile on me

name: luna_rare_02
text: Hah! I remember when Nova tried to kill me. Good girl.
text_simple: hah i remember when nova tried to kill me good girl

name: luna_rare_03
text: I was once the scourge of the plains, a terror on the wind. What hope do our enemies think they have?
text_simple: i was once the scourge of the plains a terror on the wind what hope do our enemies think they have

name: luna_blink_02
text: They can't run from us now.
